title: Intermittency and flame blowout in thermoacoustic systems
authors: Lipika Kabiraj and R. I. Sujith
abstract: On bifurcations in thermoacoustic systems and the first-time identification of type-II intermittency as a distinct dynamical state that connects self-excited thermoacoustic oscillations and flame blowout.

title: Routes to chaos in a thermoacoustic system
authors: Lipika Kabiraj and R. I. Sujith
abstract: Experimental proof for the presence of chaos in thermoacoustic systems and the first demonstration of bifurcation scenarios in thermoacoustic systems.
